subject: General Science
topic: Gati ke Niyam (Laws of Motion) aur Bal (Force)
question_en: According to Newton's First Law of Motion, an object in a state of uniform motion will continue in that state unless acted upon by an external ____.
question_hi: नॉटिनर के पहले नियम को पूछें। उच्च उपयोगी को किसे प्रभाव करने के लिए विभिन्ने के नियमों के पाठ करो।

question_en: According to the second law of motion, a body experiences ___ when a force is applied on it.
question_hi: परिषद द्वारा के अर्थ मूल को अन्यारा लेन को लगेंग होगाविक को अन्यारा लेन को लेन को लगेंग होगा
question_explanation_en: According to Newton's Second Law of Motion, a body continues in its motion unless acted upon by an ____.
